## ElementHandle.isIntersectingViewport() method

Resolves to true if the element is visible in the current viewport.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isIntersectingViewport(): Promise<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;
